title: RageBlade needs a ramp up
body: I love the item but 8 auto attacks is a bit much to activate the passive. I think it should do a percentage increase per shot then double on the last to its current damage.

replies.body: It's legit pretty much meant to only be built on jax, so 8 AA's is perfectly fine, helps you clear waves.

She doesnt, because she has no space for it in her build. 
Nashoor, rylai, rabadon, void staff and LB are must have. And even if you will get it after all, you will never have an use of it anyway in late game. 
Considering games are shorter than ever, you will basically never get this item at all. Rabadon, rylai and nashoor are must have for kayle, providing utility and damage at the same time, not only damage that is dependant on stacks, which without item is not cost effective.
I play kayle since season 1, and i tried to buy this item lots of times. To be honest, a way of stacking change is what it killed this for kayle somehow. You have to AA, if you dont for 5 sec, stacks will disapear and you cannot hold them as you used to with abilities. 
The stats are cool, but unfortunately not the reason i should get it before i buy rylai and nashoor, that are essential items for a champion. 

Lets just assume we have rylai and nashoor already, rabadon is still a better choice because it will give you 230 ap by itself, while rageblade 40 ap and 30 ad, boosted up by stacks. At this point, without stacks, damage per hit is 2x higher for kayle with rabadon, and the price is 52% higher, not 100%. Including Q damage from it and a heal, rabadon is more cost effecient than rageblade with 3-4 stacks.
